name: It's Over (UCSBDad)
description:
I had a dream where I failed to stop the world from ending and couldn't get the image out of my head so I recreated it.

Download whichever version based on what peripherals you want to use (if none, either non-VR version will work.

Joystick Controls

Steer with the joystick and yaw with whatever you normally yaw with. Thrust with a throttle stick, or with w and s on the keyboard. Look around (if not in VR) with the hatstick.

Gamepad controls

Steer with the left stick, look around with the Directional pad. Yaw with the bumpers. Accelerate with the right trigger, decelerate with the left trigger.

Mouse and keyboard controls

Move around with the mouse. Throttle with the w and s keys. Yaw with a and d keys. Look around with the numpad.
